features: Snuggle Plus SuperFresh liquid fabric conditioner features the Snuggly softness you love, plus odor eliminating technology; It doesn’t just mask tough odor, it helps eliminate it and releases Snuggly freshness

Snuggle Plus SuperFresh is the first-ever odor fighting regimen with liquid fabric conditioner, dryer sheets, and freshness boosters designed to help eliminate tough odor and keep your favorites fresh

This concentrated formula delivers 2X more Snuggly softness in every drop vs our standard Snuggle SuperFresh liquid fabric softener, so you don’t have to use as much to leaves your clothes feeling soft and smelling fresh
Safe for standard and high efficiency (HE) washing machines
This package includes one 75-ounce bottles of Snuggle SuperFresh 2X concentrated liquid fabric softener in Original scent, enough for 150 loads
body.description: Snuggle SuperFresh liquid fabric softener doesn’t just mask tough odor, it eliminates tough odors and releases Snuggly Freshness! Enjoy the Snuggle benefits you love like Snuggly Softness and long-lasting freshness plus specially formulated technology that attacks tough odors like body, pet, active, damp and outdoor odors. Try our odor fighting regimen by adding SuperFresh dryer sheets and SuperFresh Scent Shakes. This concentrated formula delivers 2X more Snuggly softness in every drop vs our standard Snuggle SuperFresh liquid fabric softener, so you don’t have to use as much to leaves your clothes feeling soft and smelling fresh. This package includes one 75-ounce bottles of Snuggle SuperFresh 2X concentrated liquid fabric softener in Original scent, enough for 150 loads.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My New Brand!
reviews.reviewText: Thought I would try this at a friend's recommendation and I was very surprised. The light pleasant scent lasted a few days longer than the "other" one. The cost is less and the scent is nicer. It takes care of the softening and static well. Yes, I highly recommend this fabric softener!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Two thumbs up
reviews.reviewText: I don’t use any other fabric softener . It can be difficult to keep two large dogs smelling like roses ! LOL ! No , I don’t use it on the dogs but I certainly use it on everything else . Clothing , bedding , carpets and rugs and the furniture . I love the smell and how fluffy it keeps everything .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Smells amazing, and makes our linens super soft. I love the smell of clean laundry ;)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This fabric softner is wonderful and the bottle lasts a long time for me. It is also very well priced !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smells so good
reviews.reviewText: Hubby is a commercial fisherman and this helps to eliminate the tough smells. Also works so well on kids dirty sweaty sports clothes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This fabric softener is amazing. I have two dogs. Stubborn dogs. Bully breeds do what they want when they want, and don't wait for more than 30 seconds for you to get to the door #oof.. ANYWAY, they basically pee on the rug by the door. NOTHING ever gets the stench of dog urine out of anything ultimately. Until I found this. IT IS AMAZING 👏!!! It is the ONLY thing I have found to make EVERYTHING not only smell AMAZING, but I can also throw in a few towels to make a full load of laundry and the smell is not transferred onto other fabrics! If you have a bed-wetter, SAME THING. Yes, I use a bit more than normal when washing, but it's because THE SMELL IS AMAZING and I want to smell it ERRRRRYwhere. Legit, do yourself a favor and just buy it. Cheap AF if you buy it on Amazon, too 😁. I'd give it 10 stars if I could.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Packaged for virtually no spill and smells fantastic!
reviews.reviewText: I love the design of the packaging. I love the smell of my clothes after they are dried and the smell of the softener going into my laundry as well!The spout on the bottle is different from all the others I have seen. This poured neatly and easily without a spill which seems impossible for me normally!The smell just wakes my senses up and is delightful!The smell stays for a good while in my clothes and I feel more confidence giving that hug or being in close quarters.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Snuggle clothes rinse
reviews.reviewText: Amazon has the larger sized bottle , so now I don’t have to fear running out quickly. Love the scent too.
